original: idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti
analyzed: idha bhikkhu an uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam an uppādāya chandam janeti

original: vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ
analyzed: vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati uppannānam pāpakānam akusalāna

original: dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
analyzed: dhammānam pahānāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati
analyzed: an uppannānam kusalānam dhammānam uppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati

original: cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya
analyzed: cittam paggaṇhāti padahati uppannānam kusalānam dhammānam ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya

original: vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: Kathañca bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhu anuppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam anuppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: Tattha katame anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā?
analyzed: tattha katame anuppannāḥ pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ
tad sampayuttaḥ vedanā kkhandhaḥ saññā kkhandho saṅkhāra kkhandho viññāṇa kkhandho
tad samuṭṭhānam kāya kammam vacī kammam manaḥ kamma
ime vuccanti anuppannāḥ pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Iti imesaṁ anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: iti imesam anuppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam anuppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: Yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando—
analyzed: yaḥ chando chandika tā kattu kamya tā kusalaḥ dhammacchando

original: Imaṁ chandaṁ janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: imam chandam janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti
yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambho pe sammāvāyāmo

original: Iminā vāyāmena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato.
analyzed: iminā vāyāmena upetaḥ hoti samupetaḥ upāgataḥ samupāgataḥ upapannaḥ sampanno samannāgataḥ
yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambho pe sammāvāyāmo

original: Imaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhati samārabhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
analyzed: imam vīriyam ārabhati samārabhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti
yam cittam manaḥ mānasam pe tajjā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Imaṁ cittaṁ paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti.
analyzed: imam cittam paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti
yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambho pe sammāvāyāmo
iminā padhānena upetaḥ hoti pe samannāgato

original: Kathañca bhikkhu uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhu uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

analyzed: ta sampayuttaḥ vedanā kkhandhaḥ saññā kkhandho saṅkhāra kkhandho viññāṇa kkhandho ta samuṭṭhānam kāya kammam vacī kammam manaḥ kamma
ime vuccanti uppannā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammā

original: Yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando—

original: Imaṁ chandaṁ janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti.
analyzed: imam chandam janeti sañjaneti uṭṭhapeti samuṭṭhapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti

iminā vāyāmena upetaḥ hoti pe samannāgato

original: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambhaḥ pe sammāvāyāmaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Imaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhati samārabhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
analyzed: imam vīriyam ārabhati samārabhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti
yam cittam manaḥ mānasam pe tajjā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Imaṁ cittaṁ paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti.
analyzed: imam cittam paggaṇhāti sampaggaṇhāti upatthambheti paccupatthambheti

original: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
analyzed: yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambhaḥ pe sammāvāyāmaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: idha bhikkhu yasmin samaye lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti niyyānikam apacaya gāmim diṭṭhi gatāna

original: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
analyzed: pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja

original: viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yo tasmiṁ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe…
analyzed: viharati dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiñña yaḥ tasmin samaye cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambhaḥ pe
sammāvāyāmaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅgam magga pariyāpanna

original: idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti
analyzed: idha bhikkhu an uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam an uppādāya chandam janeti

original: vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ
analyzed: vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati uppannānam pāpakānam akusalāna

original: uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: uppannānam kusalānam dhammānam ṭhitiyāḥ asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: Catunnaṁ sammappadhānānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
analyzed: catunnam sammappadhānānam kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatā pe kati saraṇā kati araṇā

original: Siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
analyzed: siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā

original: Siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
analyzed: siyā sa vitakka sa vicārā siyā a vitakka vicāra mattā siyā a vitakka a vicārā

original: Siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
analyzed: siyā pīti sahagatā siyā sukha sahagatā siyā upekkhā sahagatā
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā
na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukā

original: Na maggārammaṇā, maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā “maggādhipatino”ti.
analyzed: na magga ārammaṇā magga hetukā siyā magga adhipatino siyā na vattabbā magga adhipatino ti

original: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā “uppādino”ti.
analyzed: siyā uppannā siyā anuppannā na vattabbā uppādino ti

original: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
analyzed: siyā atītā siyā anāgatā siyā paccuppannā
na vattabbā atīta ārammaṇā atipi anāgata ārammaṇā atipi paccuppanna ārammaṇā atipi

original: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.
analyzed: siyā ajjhattā siyā bahiddhā siyā ajjhatta bahiddhā

original: Na vattabbā hetū ceva sahetukā cāti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: na vattabbā hetū ca iva sa hetukā ca ati sa hetukā ca iva na ca hetū

original: Na vattabbā hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cāti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.
analyzed: na vattabbā hetū ca iva hetu sampayuttā ca ati hetu sampayuttā ca iva na ca hetū

original: Na vattabbā āsavā ceva sāsavā cātipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi.
analyzed: na vattabbā āsavā ca iva sa āsavā ca atipi sa āsavā ca iva no ca

original: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
analyzed: na vattabbā āsavā ca iva āsava sampayuttā ca atipi āsava sampayuttā ca iva no ca āsavā atipi
siyā sa vitakkā siyā a vitakkā
siyā pīti sahagatā siyā na pīti sahagatā
siyā sukha sahagatā siyā na sukha sahagatā
siyā upekkhā sahagatā siyā na upekkhā sahagatā
